extendedInfo.description: GO Locker Rollingball Theme, design to GO Launcher EX, is available now!Notice:Make sure GO locker V1.08 has been installed.====>Tips:1. Make sure GO Launcher EX V2.58 or above and GO Locker v1.05 has been installed;2. Click âMENUâ->Preferencesâ->Theme Settingsâ->GO Locker---->My lockerâ to choose the theme;Please let me know if you meet any bugs or want any improvement!E-mail: golauncher@goforandroid.com

reviews.title: please fix
reviews.comment: please fix, this theme is not fit to screen, in samsung galaxy young... i love it if you fix it, its too ugly now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really fun !
reviews.comment: To the People who keep complaining that it easily goes past your pattern lock or anything it has absolutely nothing to do with this theme. If you go into your GO locker settings it obviously shows you how to lock your home button so it does not do it again. And if you mute your media volume the sound at the end is gone. Just enjoy this theme,it\'s pretty amazing to me. Great job !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dom
reviews.comment: Its very cool but I gotta prob wen im in a txt and my phone locks my keyboard stays up and its hard to find a hole I can\'t see ha plz fix DROID3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I Would Give It 5 Stars If I Could Remove The Sound \342\200\246 Fix This Please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cute and fun!
reviews.comment: i love it! it makes unlocking my phone fun :D and for those who are complaining about the success noise at the end, just mute your media :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s great but...
reviews.comment: The graphics doesn\'t go well for my Samsung Galaxy Young. Please fix it and I\'ll give 5 stars for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Home screen unlocks phone
reviews.comment: I have a lock screen pattern pattern but when you press the home key it bypasses it FIX and it will definitely will have 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea but some bugs
reviews.comment: Great idea and a fun unlock screen. Just a few bugs though as previously mentioned. You can bypass the lock screen (ball screen or pattern/password screen) by pressing the home button. Also removing the sound and vibrations in the go locker options don\'t work for this theme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great stuff
reviews.comment: Actually deserves 5 stars but didn\'t rate it coz it freezes at times...:) though a fun theme :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but...
reviews.comment: A few issues, sometimes the ball goes threw the walls. Please fix. Other than that, its awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!!!
reviews.comment: Great job with this one! You can press the home key and it takes you to your main screen... may have been a glitch but it\'s convenient When trying to get phone unlocked quickly. Easy 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So fun
reviews.comment: So fun I lock my phone after unlocking it just to do it again:D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whiteboi
reviews.comment: This app is pointless unless it\'s my phone but the ball doesn\'t move so unless they can fix it so it moves on my phone I will leave it at 1 star and I really like the app but it doesn\'t work on my phone period please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really Cute
reviews.comment: I love it. Download it if your not in too much of a rush to get in your phone. Can\'t change background of locker. Don\'t like that, but overall really cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashed my phone!!!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t always work right and I\'m uninstalling because I just had to pull my battery. I sent an email. We will see what go that does.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: No problem at all. it\'s really funny and runs clean on my phone.

reviews.title: Really awesome
reviews.comment: So much fun to unlock but its kindof glitchy cause the backgroung is not lined up correctly but other than that its great!!!!!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: It\'s just great, you get the metal ball in the hole and, boom, you open it. Very brain stimulating.  xD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun, would make a better game than locker theme
reviews.comment: Cool idea, entertaining! The hole you drop ball into needs to be in a corner every time so easy to unlock quickly when you aren\'t able to stand absolutely still when unlocking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works exactly as advertised. On my Bionic it even vibrates when the ball hits anything. Good job!
